sourcesContent:
const express = require("express")
const app = express();

const sneakers=[
    {
        id: 1,
        name: "Air Jordan 1",
        brand: "Nike",
        price: "1000",
        description: "The legend goes, when the original Air Jordan I debuted in 1985, the predominantly red and black design was banned",
        imageUrl:
          "https://static.nike.com/a/images/t_prod_ss/w_960,c_limit,f_auto/lxgedfocjc5owejiyhsa/air-jordan-1-retro-chicago-release-date.jpg",
      },
      {
        id: 2,
        name: "Air Jordan 3",
        brand: "Nike",
        price: "400",
        description: "This AJ3 rounds out the Fragment x Jordan and were designed by Hiroshima",
        imageUrl:
          "https://static.nike.com/a/images/t_prod_ss/w_960,c_limit,f_auto/bd3dd492-e31c-4bd7-9878-e7e7f1f9e1fe/air-jordan-3-x-fragment-white-release-date.jpg",
      },
      {
        id: 3,
        name: "Air Jordan 4",
        brand: "Nike",
        price: "1600",
        description: "Signature Off-White™️ cable tie put the finishing touch on this monochromatic masterpiece.",
        imageUrl:
          "https://static.nike.com/a/images/t_prod_ss/w_960,c_limit,f_auto/cc0bf425-a85f-4535-a0e8-d6cc5da84caa/womens-air-jordan-4-x-off-white-sail-release-date.jpg",
      },
      {
        id: 4,
        name: "Yeezy",
        brand: "Adidas",
        price: "500",
        description: "Yeezy by the mega footwear and athletic wear brand Adidas, presents stunning pair of sneakers for trendy.",
        imageUrl:
          "https://laced.imgix.net/products/CP9654/01.jpg?auto=format&fit=crop&w=824",
      },
      {
        id: 5,
        name: "New Balance 550",
        brand: "NB",
        price: "300",
        description: " The 1989 design keeps harkening back to its debut era by indulging in simple, but fresh two-tone colorways.",
        imageUrl:
          "https://cdn.sanity.io/images/c1chvb1i/production/d28366bab1404c2095ccd6303ad1262ec2524f17-1100x735.jpg",
      },
      {
        id: 6,
        name: "SB Dunk",
        brand: "Nike",
        price: "1400",
        description: "The quirky, California-based label now links up with Nike SB to lend its uncommon perspective to a cherished style: the Dunk Low. ",
        imageUrl:
          "https://c.static-nike.com/a/images/t_prod_ss/w_960,c_limit,f_auto/3a06a28e-3671-47f8-a816-632eb280eb7d/sb-dunk-low-strangelove-release-date.jpg",
      },
      {
        id: 7,
        name: "Dunk low",
        brand: "Nike",
        price: "400",
        description: "Before cementing its status as a streetwear icon and skateboarding staple, the Dunk began its journey on the university hardwood. ",
        imageUrl:
          "https://static.nike.com/a/images/t_prod_ss/w_960,c_limit,f_auto/i1-004ef3ed-1a1f-4969-a549-d069ca48be7c/dunk-low-orange-blaze-release-date.jpg",
      },
      {
        id: 8,
        name: "Air Force 1",
        brand: "Nike",
        price: "5000",
        description: "The Air Force 1 is one of the most versatile sneakers ever, and it’s no stranger to a wide variety of looks and materials.",
        imageUrl:
          "https://static.nike.com/a/images/t_prod_ss/w_960,c_limit,f_auto/et0yjfqthebjwqxt4qvh/nike-the-ten-air-force-1-low-off-white-release-date.jpg",
      },
      
]
app.get("/v1/sneakers",(req,res)=>{
    res.status(200).json(sneakers)
})
app.listen("8080",()=>{
    console.log("Server is running...")
})
